name: Art Face By David Kirk
description:
Make your face a work of art!  Art Face is stuffed with fun! 
David Kirk brings you his very best toy ever.

Over two hundred animated paintings are syncopated with tiny tunes and
silly sounds, all swirling happily in a tasty stew of music, art, and motion. 

You can make over a trillion magical combinations, but don’t stop there! 

With the digital photography section, you can create magic faces of your
very own, featuring you, your family, friends, and pets - anything you can
put in a picture or short movie. You can even add your own sound effects
and music.

App Features

* Over two hundred animated original oil paintings combine to make billions of unique faces

* Beautiful art created by David Kirk of Miss Spider fame

* Original music and sound effects combine into thousands of unique tunes

* Changeable backgrounds with rhythm sounds

* Record your own animated faces

* Record your own music and sounds

* Kid-friendly interface

* Open ended creative play

* No third-party advertising

* No in-app purchases

Artist and author, David Kirk, is the creator of the Miss Spider books and the Sunny Patch brand of toys.

Visit my website – davidkirktreehouse.com for inspiration and some of my favorite examples.

David Kirk is the artist and author of Miss Spider's Tea Party, Miss Spider's Wedding, Miss Spider';s New Car, Miss Spider';s ABC, Nova's Ark, Nova the Robot's Super Galactic Pop-up, Nova the Robot Builds a Friend, Nova the Robot Fixes his Spaceship, Nova the Robot book and toy, Twinkle Twinkle Little Hedgehog, Little Miss Spider, Little Miss Spider at Sunny Patch School, Little Miss Spider's Christmas Wish, Humbug, The Listening Walk, Little Bird Biddle Bird, Little Mouse Biddle Mouse, Little Pig Biddle Pig, Little Bunny Biddle Bunny, Oh So Brave Dragon, Oh So Tiny Bunny, and many others.

He is also creator of the TV show, Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Friends, the Sunny Patch line of toys and garden supplies, David Kirk's Fun House toys, Hoobert Toys, and Ovicular Toyworks.
